title: Was the flood of the seed cellar caused by global warming?
subtitle: Although the melting of permanent ice caused flooding in the tunnel of access to the vault, the vault itself did not penetrate and the seeds were not threatened or harmed.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Svalbard global seed cellar, built to preserve the Earth ' s plant genetic diversity in the face of future disasters, was flooded by the melting of the permanent freeze.
